sentences: Ma ei tea muidugi kõiki reegleid, aga ma proovin.
Nad rikkusid kõik reeglid ja said karistada.
See mäng on lihtne, ainult mõned reeglid.
context: The word 'reegleid' is the plural genitive case of the Estonian word 'reegel', which means 'rule'. It refers to a principle or set of principles governing behavior. In English, it’s commonly used when discussing guidelines, laws, or standards that must be followed.
